doc:
David Thornton (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Thornton_(actor) 0 David Thornton (born June 12, 1953) is an American actor. He has appeared in John Q, Home Alone 3, Law Order, The Notebook, and The Other Woman, among other roles. He is the husband of Grammy Award-winning singer and songwriter Cyndi Lauper. David_Thornton ( born June_12_,_1953 ) is an_American_actor . He has_appeared in John_Q , Home_Alone_3_,_Law_ , The_Notebook , and The_Other_Woman , among other_roles . He is the_husband of Grammy_Award-winning_singer_and_songwriter_Cyndi_Lauper .
